portfolio.title: Video Dubbing System
portfolio.description: The platform which extracts audio from any input video in English, translates audio in other 50 Indian languages with subtitles and most importantly, it geneates dubbed video in nearly 50 languages.

portfolio.title: Smart Attendance Tool
portfolio.description: The GUI made using Python which helps to store the Student Data and mark attendance. Attendance sheet is also generated which could be shared on Teachers mail.

portfolio.title: Hajeri - The SmartTool
portfolio.description: A flutter application to automate the attendance using 3 features such as admin permission, Location and Fingerprint
